docs.title: Lazuli Devkit
docs.text:
Lazuli Devkit是基岩版脚本API的一个简易开发工具包，尚处开发阶段。

本包提供了一些开发中的实用函数与示例，可以加速你的脚本开发！

docs.title: 安装
docs.text:
新建一个Npm包，在.npmrc文件中添加以下内容：

@lazuli:registry=https://codeberg.org/api/packages/lazuli/npm/
registry=https://registry.yarnpkg.com

接着运行以下命令：

npm install @lazuli/ldk2

你就可以在脚本中使用该开发包了，例如：

// 导入函数
import { randomInterger } from "@lazuli/ldk2"

// 生成0-114514随机整数
randomInterger(114514);

docs.title: 打包
docs.text: 你需要一个支持将依赖递归打包进输出文件的脚本打包器，例如Esbuild进行打包。

docs.title: 已知问题
docs.text:
目前开发包中存在以下问题亟待修复：

存在版本 描述 备注 2.0.0 withWeightChance有时会抛出错误 已经在 2.1.0-beta 中修复

docs.title: 快速开始
docs.text: 在开始之前，请确保你的设备安装了 Node.js 包管理器，我们推荐使用Pnpm，这也是我们选择的包管理器。

docs.title: 安装
docs.text:
新建一个Npm包，在.npmrc文件中添加以下内容：

@lazuli:registry=https://codeberg.org/api/packages/lazuli/npm/
registry=https://registry.yarnpkg.com

接着运行以下命令：

NpmPnpmYarn 
npm install @lazuli/ldk2

pnpm install @lazuli/ldk2

yarn add @lazuli/ldk2

你就可以在脚本中使用该开发包了，例如：

// 导入函数
import { randomInterger } from "@lazuli/ldk2"

// 生成0-114514随机整数
randomInterger(114514);

docs.title: 初始化模组
docs.text:
接着，你可以用initializeMod函数来初始化模组并配置一些信息：

function initializeMod(
  id: string,
  name: string,
  metaData?: ModMetaData,
  event?: (arg: WorldInitializeAfterEvent) => void
): void

例如：

initializeMod("example-mod", "示例模组");

docs.title: 打包
docs.text: 你需要一个支持将依赖递归打包进输出文件的脚本打包器，例如Esbuild进行打包。

docs.title: 获取模组信息
docs.text: LDK的核心脚本中内置了一些函数，用于获取initializeMod中配置的模组信息。

docs.title: 获取模组名称
docs.text:
getModName()可以获取模组名称，例如：

import { getModName } from "@lazuli/ldk2";

getModName();

docs.title: 获取模组ID
docs.text:
getModId()可以获取模组ID，例如：

import { getModId } from "@lazuli/ldk2";

getModId();

docs.title: 初始化模组
docs.text:
你可以用initializeMod函数来初始化模组并配置一些信息：

function initializeMod(
  id: string,
  name: string,
  metaData?: ModMetaData,
  event?: (arg: WorldInitializeAfterEvent) => void
): void

例如：

initializeMod("example-mod", "示例模组");

请注意，在LDK里不调用initializeMod函数，大部分功能仍可以正常运行，此时LDK会使用默认的配置信息运行：

/**
 * Metadata of the mod.
 */
let modData: ModBaseData = {
  id: "ldk",
  name: "Lazuli Development Kit",
};

docs.title: 模组元信息
docs.text:
由于脚本API暂时无法读取附加包清单文件，模组的元信息需要在初始化函数中的metaData?: ModMetaData参数声明：

/**
 * Metadata of the mod.
 */
export interface ModMetaData {
  /**
   * A short description of the mod.
   */
  description?: string | RawMessage;
  /**
   * Author of the mod.
   */
  author?: string;
  /**
   * Contributors of the mod.
   */
  contributors?: string[] | string;
  /**
   *  Path to the mod icon.
   */
  iconPath?: string;
}

在其中：

  • description为模组的简短介绍；
  • author为模组的作者，只能填一个；
  • contributors为模组贡献者，可以填多个；
  • iconPath为模组包图标的资源路径。

Tip

模组元数据接口暂时没有用途，但在未来会添加相关功能

docs.title: 简述
docs.text: Lazuli Core Script包括初始化模组信息的函数与接口，包名为@lazuli/core。

docs.title: LDK: Lazuli API
docs.text:
Add some useful instances for Minecraft Bedrock Edition.

Minecraft 基岩版脚本API的一些实用实例。

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Add the following code in the .npmrc file:

在.npmrc文件中添加以下内容：

@lazuli:registry=https://codeberg.org/api/packages/lazuli/npm/
@minecraft:registry=https://registry.yarnpkg.com

Then run the following command:

接着运行以下命令：

npm install @lazuli/api

docs.title: Pack
docs.text:
You need a bundler that supports inline dependencies into the output file (such as esbuild) for packaging.

你需要一个支持将依赖递归打包进输出文件的脚本打包器，例如Esbuild。

docs.title: Class: CustomArticleComponentBuilder
docs.text: Build a simple article item component, it doesn't support ArticleCollection.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• typeId: string

The id that represents this custom component. Must have a namespace. This id can be specified in an item's JSON configuration under the minecraft:custom_components item component.

• title: string | RawMessage

Title of the article.

• body: string | RawMessage

Body of the article, support RawMessage.

docs.title: typeId
docs.text:
readonly typeId: string

The id that represents this custom component. Must have a namespace. This id can be specified in an item's JSON configuration under the minecraft:custom_components item component.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
// Define the component
  const COMPONENT = new CustomBlockComponent("lazuli:example", {
    onEntityFallOn(arg) {
      arg.dimension.createExplosion(arg.block.location, 5);
     },
   })
  // Registry the component
  Register.componentRegistry(COMPONENT);

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• typeId: string

The id that represents this custom component. Must have a namespace. This id can be specified in an item's JSON configuration under the minecraft:custom_components item component.

• components: BlockCustomComponent

The collection of event functions that will be called when the event occurs on an item using this custom component id.

docs.title: typeId
docs.text:
readonly typeId: string

The id that represents this custom component. Must have a namespace. This id can be specified in an item's JSON configuration under the minecraft:custom_components item component.

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
// Define the component
 const COMPONENT = new CustomItemComponent("lazuli:example", {
    onConsume(arg) {
      arg.source.addEffect("posion", 200);
    },
  })
  // Registry the component
  Register.componentRegistry(COMPONENT);

docs.title: LDK: Core Script
docs.text:
A simple mod toolchain's core script for Minecraft Bedrock Edition.

LDK （一个简单的Minecraft脚本API开发工具链） 的核心脚本。

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Add the following code in the .npmrc file:

在.npmrc文件中添加以下内容：

@lazuli:registry=https://codeberg.org/api/packages/lazuli/npm/

Then run the following command:

接着运行以下命令：

npm install @lazuli/core

docs.title: Pack
docs.text:
You need a bundler that supports inline dependencies into the output file (such as esbuild) for packaging.

你需要一个支持将依赖递归打包进输出文件的脚本打包器，例如Esbuild。

docs.title: Function: getMetadata()
docs.text:
getMetadata(): ModMetaData

Get metadata of the mod that initializeMod setted .

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• id: string

Id of the mod.

• name: string

Name of the mod.

• metaData?: ModMetaData

Metadata of the mod.

• event?

This event fires when the script environment is initialized on a world.

docs.title: name
docs.text:
name: string

Name of the mod, default is Minecraft

i18n is not supported.

docs.title: description?
docs.text:
optional description: string | RawMessage

A short description of the mod.

docs.title: LDK: Game Data
docs.text:
Some game data for Minecraft Bedrock Edition.

Minecraft 基岩版的一些游戏数据。

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Add the following code in the .npmrc file:

在.npmrc文件中添加以下内容：

@lazuli:registry=https://codeberg.org/api/packages/lazuli/npm/

Then run the following command:

接着运行以下命令：

npm install @lazuli/game-data

docs.title: Pack
docs.text:
You need a bundler that supports inline dependencies into the output file (such as esbuild) for packaging.

你需要一个支持将依赖递归打包进输出文件的脚本打包器，例如Esbuild。

docs.title: command?
docs.text:
optional command: string | string[]

Display article when player send the command.

docs.title: firstLoad?
docs.text:
optional firstLoad: boolean

Display article when the world first load.

docs.title: itemStack?
docs.text:
optional itemStack: ItemStack

Display article when player use the item.

docs.title: duration
docs.text:
duration: number

Amount of time, in ticks, for the effect to apply. There are 20 ticks per second. Use TicksPerSecond constant to convert between ticks and seconds. The value must be within he range [0, 20000000].

docs.title: effectType
docs.text:
effectType: string | EffectType

Type of effect to add to the entity.

docs.title: showParticles?
docs.text:
optional showParticles: boolean

If true, will show particles when effect is on the entity.

docs.title: Interface: EntityData
docs.text: Entity data, including the entity's type id and its name.

docs.title: Interface: ItemData
docs.text: Item data, including the item and its name.

docs.title: Variable: axeConvertBlockIds
docs.text:
const axeConvertBlockIds: string[]

All block ids that axe can convert.

docs.title: Variable: hoeConvertBlockIds
docs.text:
const hoeConvertBlockIds: string[]

All block ids that hoe can convert.

docs.title: Variable: shovelConvertBlockIds
docs.text:
const shovelConvertBlockIds: string[]

All block ids that shovel can convert.

docs.title: LDK: Logger
docs.text:
A logger for Minecraft Bedrock Edition.

Minecraft 基岩版脚本API的日志信息组件。

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Add the following code in the .npmrc file:

在.npmrc文件中添加以下内容：

@lazuli:registry=https://codeberg.org/api/packages/lazuli/npm/
@minecraft:registry=https://registry.yarnpkg.com

Then run the following command:

接着运行以下命令：

npm install @lazuli/logger

docs.title: Pack
docs.text:
You need a bundler that supports inline dependencies into the output file (such as esbuild) for packaging.

你需要一个支持将依赖递归打包进输出文件的脚本打包器，例如Esbuild。

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• message: string

• players?: Player[]

the players that would receive stack trace.

docs.title: fatal()
docs.text:
fatal(message): void

Same as error(), but the stack trace will be sent to all players

docs.title: info()
docs.text:
info(message, players?): void

Log with LogLevel.INFO The message will be sent to world if no players are given.

docs.title: log()
docs.text:
log(message, players?): void

The log() function is an alias for info.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• message: string

• players?: Player[]

the players that would receive stack trace.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• id?: string

if it's not set, the value will be te result of the getModName().

• feedback?: string

the info which will be sent when an error or a fatal error.

docs.title: Function: addToLogHistory()
docs.text:
addToLogHistory(log): string

Add to the log history.

Will be automatically added.

docs.title: LDK: Utils
docs.text:
Add some useful functions for Minecraft Bedrock Edition.

Minecraft 基岩版脚本API的一些实用函数。

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Add the following code in the .npmrc file:

在.npmrc文件中添加以下内容：

@lazuli:registry=https://codeberg.org/api/packages/lazuli/npm/
@minecraft:registry=https://registry.yarnpkg.com

Then run the following command:

接着运行以下命令：

npm install @lazuli/utils

docs.title: Pack
docs.text:
You need a bundler that supports inline dependencies into the output file (such as esbuild) for packaging.

你需要一个支持将依赖递归打包进输出文件的脚本打包器，例如Esbuild。

docs.title: Function: addEffect()
docs.text:
addEffect(entity, effectType, duration, options?): void

Wrapper function for adding effect(s) or effect group.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• entity: Entity

The entity to add effect.

• effectType: string | string[] | EffectType | EffectType[] | EffectGroups

the effect(s) to add, use EffectGroups to add group effects.

• duration: number

Amount of time, in ticks, for the effect to apply. There are 20 ticks per second. Use TicksPerSecond constant to convert between ticks and seconds. The value must be within he range [0, 20000000].

• options?: EntityEffectOptions

Additional options for the effect.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• dimension: Dimension

Area's dimension.

• affectOption: EntityQueryOptions

Contains options for selecting entities within an area.

• effectType: string | EffectType

Type of effect to add to the entity.

• duration: number

Amount of time, in ticks, for the effect to apply. There are 20 ticks per second. Use TicksPerSecond constant to convert between ticks and seconds. The value must be within the range [0, 20000000].

• effectOption?: EntityEffectOptions

Additional options for the effect.

docs.title: Function: ascendingSort()
docs.text:
ascendingSort(arr): void

Sort an number array in ascending order.

docs.title: Function: checkPercent()
docs.text:
checkPercent(num): boolean

Check whether the number is a percentage.

docs.title: Returns
docs.text:
boolean

Return true if the number is a percentage.

docs.title: Function: clearEffect()
docs.text:
clearEffect(entity, effectType): void

Wrapper function for removing effect(s) or effect group.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• entity: Entity

The entity to be removed effect.

• effectType: string | string[] | EffectType | EffectType[] | EffectGroups

The effect(s) to remove, use EffectGroups to remove group effects.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• item: ItemStack

The ItemStack.

• value: number

The amount to be removed.

docs.title: Throws
docs.text: SapiError if amount is not enough to be removed.

docs.title: Throws
docs.text: SapiError if max amount is not high enough.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• item: ItemStack

The ItemStack to be damaged.

• value: number

The durability to be removed.

• entity?: Entity

The optional Entity which breaks this tool.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• dimension: Dimension

Area's dimension.

• damageOption: EntityQueryOptions

Contains options for selecting entities within an area.

• amount: number

Amount of damage to apply.

docs.title: Function: descendingSort()
docs.text:
descendingSort(arr): void

Sort an number array in descending order.

Find blocks around the given location with specific radius.

The Block.typeId to be searched.

• location: Vector3

• dimension: Dimension

• radius: number

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:

The owner of the slot.

getExpCost(level): number

• item: ItemStack

The item(s) to give

insertLoot(dimension, blockLocation, path, toolType?): void

Distributes given loot table to a container block.

• blockLocation: Vector3

Location to the container block.

• path: string

Path to loot table.

• toolType?: string

Specifies a tool to be used to simulatively kill or loot.

docs.title: Function: loot()
docs.text:
loot(dimension, location, path, toolType?): void

Drops the given loot table into the dimension.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• dimension: Dimension

The dimension to drop loot.

• location: Vector3

Location to drop loot.

• path: string

Path to loot table.

• toolType?: string

Specifies a tool to be used to simulatively kill or loot.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• message: string | RawMessage

A message you want to display in the alert dialog.

• player: Player | Player[]

The player(s) to watch the alert dialog.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• message: string | RawMessage

A message you want to display in the confirmation dialog.

• player: Player

The player to watch the confirm dialog.

docs.title: Returns
docs.text:
void

A boolean indicating whether OK (true) or Cancel (false) was selected.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• message: string | RawMessage

Body of the message.

• players: Player[]

Players that will get the message

• sendToWorld?: boolean

If specified, will send the message to world.

• postByForm?: boolean

If specified, will send the message by ui.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• loreText: string

The lore to push.

• item: ItemStack

The item to push lore.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• max: number

The maximum value (inclusive). Decimals will be parsed as integers.

• min: number = 0

The minimum value (inclusive). Decimals will be parsed as integers. Default value is 0.

docs.title: Returns
docs.text:
number

A random integer between min and max (inclusive).

docs.title: Returns
docs.text:
void

The container of the item that has been removed

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• item: undefined | string | ItemStack

The ItemStack or ItemStack.typeId to be replaced. if it's undefined, every empty slot will be filled.

• newItem: undefined | string | ItemStack

the new ItemStack. if it's undefined, the matched slot will be cleared.

• container: Container

the Container which will be searched.

docs.title: Function: requireNonNull()
docs.text:
requireNonNull(object, message?): any

A simple function that checks if a variable is undefined or null; Like Objects.requireNonNull in java.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• object: any

the object or variable to check.

• message?: string

the Error message (if thrown).

docs.title: Function: setEquipmentItem()
docs.text:
setEquipmentItem(entity, item?, slot?): boolean | undefined

Replaces the item in the given EquipmentSlot.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• entity: Entity

The owner of the slot.

• item?: ItemStack

The item to equip. If undefined, clears the slot.

• slot?: EquipmentSlot = EquipmentSlot.Mainhand

The slot to set item stack, default is EquipmentSlot.Mainhand.

docs.title: Function: setSlot()
docs.text:
setSlot(entity, slot, item?): void

Set an item stack within a particular slot.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• entity: Entity

• slot: number

Zero-based index of the slot to set an item at.

• item?: ItemStack

Stack of items to place within the specified slot.

docs.title: Returns
docs.text:
boolean

A boolean of whether the event will be triggered.

docs.title: Interface: PercentChanceData
docs.text: The event and chance data for withPercentChance.

docs.title: chance
docs.text:
chance: number

The trigger probability, should be a percentage (0~1).

docs.title: Interface: WeightChanceData
docs.text: The event and weight data for withWeightChance.
